Articles.Content:
Just had my antivirus make quite a bit of noise because what seems to be a malicious ad. URL:

h.mypageresults.com
I will forward this higher up first thing on monday, do you have a screenshot of the ad?
Nah, the antivirus hid it. Although, for what it's worth I'm in Sweden so that narrows it down in case you use area-specific ads.
